caption.p: Reversed-phase HPLC (RP-HPLC) profile of 1 M fraction (fraction 4) after affinity chromatography on a Heparin-Sepharose column, washed with buffer containing 1M NaCl. All collected fractions characterized are indicated by ciphers; a dominant peak is marked by a black arrow. Axis: X—time, min; Y—is a digital signal axis (mAU, milli Absorbance Units).
